name: Lost Wisdom
description:
STORY

Control a captain of a cargo ship delivering some valuables to a far away sector. When you arrive at the sector, you learn that the sector is in a lockdown. You need to find a way out.

CONTROLS

Movement: WASD + Mouse
Primary Weapon: Left Mouse Button
Secondary Weapon: Right Mouse Button

Map: TAB
Inventory: I
Quest Panel: Q
Skills Panel: L

!!!! WE HAVE SO MANY BUGS THANKS TO THE GAME, I'LL FIX THEM SOON BE PATIENT :D !!!!!!
